items.title: IEEE SPS @ UF — SPS Curriculum & Workshops
items.desc: Jupyter-based workshops connecting analysis, probability, and ML with applied signal processing case studies.

items.title: Audio Fingerprinting (Shazam-style) Analysis
items.desc: Educational tooling and experiments around audio fingerprints, similarity scoring, and robustness to noise and tempo changes.

items.title: Plato’s Cave
items.desc: Agentic system that extracts features from research papers and scores nodes by relevance, similarity, and structure to support reviewers.
